title: [Large-Scale] Technology-Mediated Online Learning Community for Developing Cross-Cultural Competencies in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in scientific disciplines and intermediate or higher English communication skills
context.additional_context: Intercultural communication competency development program preparing for global collaborative work environments in scientific fields

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peers from diverse cultural backgrounds to solve science-related problems using technology.
Learners can analyze and apply science communication strategies that reflect cultural differences to real-world contexts.
Learners can create and provide feedback on science content reflecting cross-cultural perspectives using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
